ingredients.item: A lemon twist or chilled green olive, to garnish

instructions.step: Put the vodka and dry vermouth in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Stir using a long-handled spoon and strain into a small chilled glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or chilled green olive.
